Class Computus

  • java.lang.Object
    • Computus

  • public class Computus
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    Elliot Lohr This class will create a computus object, which is capable of computing the date of easter given a year and displaying how many times easter occurs on each day in a gregorian cycle

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private double day
      The day that easter will occur on
      private double month
      The month that easter will occur in
      private double year
      The year that program will determine the date of easter in

    • Constructor Summary

      Computus()
      No argument constructor
